# Guardian Grimoire (Level 15 Abjurer)
## Overview
*These three well-made books are covered with runes of warding against outsiders and undead. The pages inside show water damage along the edges.*

**Protection** *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|Explosive runes]]* (Reflex DC 16) and *[[Fire Trap (Spell)|fire trap]]* (Reflex DC 17)

**Opposition Schools** Illusion, necromancy

**Value** 10,665 gp (13,665 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

8th—*[[Binding (Spell)|binding]]*, *[[Maze (Spell)|maze]]*, *[[Protection From Spells (Spell)|protection from spells]]* <sup>S</sup>

7th—*[[Banishment (Spell)|banishment]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Delayed Blast Fireball (Spell)|delayed blast fireball]]*, *[[Expend (Spell)|expend]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Form of the Dragon II (Spell)|form of the dragon II]]*, *[[Grasping Hand (Spell)|grasping hand]]*

6th—*[[Analyze Dweomer (Spell)|analyze dweomer]]*, *[[Antimagic Field (Spell)|antimagic field]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Chain Lightning (Spell)|chain lightning]]*, *[[Dispel Magic, Greater (Spell)|greater dispel magic]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[True Seeing (Spell)|true seeing]]*

5th—*[[Break Enchantment (Spell)|break enchantment]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Cone of Cold (Spell)|cone of cold]]*, *[[Dismissal (Spell)|dismissal]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Polymorph (Spell)|polymorph]]*, *[[Summon Monster V (Spell)|summon monster V]]*, *[[Wall of Force (Spell)|wall of force]]*

4th—*[[Confusion (Spell)|confusion]]*, *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, *[[Dimensional Anchor (Spell)|dimensional anchor]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Fire Trap (Spell)|fire trap]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Enlarge Person, Mass (Spell)|mass enlarge person]]*, *[[Secure Shelter (Spell)|secure shelter]]*, *[[True Form (Spell)|true form]]* <sup>S</sup>,

3rd—*[[Cloak of Winds (Spell)|cloak of winds]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Daylight (Spell)|daylight]]*, *[[Enter Image (Spell)|enter image]]*, *[[Explosive Runes (Spell)|explosive runes]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Haste (Spell)|haste]]*, *[[Lightning Bolt (Spell)|lightning bolt]]*, *[[Magic Circle Against Evil (Spell)|magic circle against evil]]* <sup>S</sup>, *water breathing* 

2nd—*[[Detect Thoughts (Spell)|detect thoughts]]*, *[[Glitterdust (Spell)|glitterdust]]*, *[[Knock (Spell)|knock]]*, *[[Protection from Arrows (Spell)|protection from arrows]]* <sup>S</sup>, *reinforcing bands*, *[[Resist Energy (Spell)|resist energy]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Scorching Ray (Spell)|scorching ray]]*, *[[Whispering Wind (Spell)|whispering wind]]*

1st—*[[Animate Rope (Spell)|animate rope]]*, *[[Detect Secret Doors (Spell)|detect secret doors]]*, *[[Detect Undead (Spell)|detect undead]]*, *[[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*, *[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|obscuring mist]]*, *[[Protection From Chaos (Spell)|protection from chaos]]* <sup>S</sup>, *shadow blade* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shocking Grasp (Spell)|shocking grasp]]*, *[[Touch of Gracelessness (Spell)|touch of gracelessness]]*

0—standard plus *[[Disrupt Undead (Spell)|disrupt undead]]* <sup>OP</sup>

**Preparation Ritual**

**Guardian Trick (Su)** With a quick phrase of power, you attempt to foil an attack. Spend this boon’s effect as an immediate action when an undead or outsider hits you with an attack. The attacking creature must reroll the attack, taking the second roll even if it is lower.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 125
